title: The Special Scent
description: Ten feet of space isn’t much, but it is enough for Arianne to take you into a world of sensuality, of dreamy sex and exotic sensations.Satisfied with her role as a lover and mother, Arianne is seeking to find her way back into the workplace and be as good at that role as she is elsewhere, but she has some struggles to overcome before that can be the case.While looking for the right thing to help her overcome the trouble at work Arianne revisits some of the better experiences she’s had, enjoying them in explicit detail - looking for something that will give her the right solution.
author: Xavier Edwards
